name: Save The Print
description:
Save The Print - A game made for all. The most entertaining game on the App Store. We promise you may lose a lot of your time playing this.

Insanely ADDICTIVE!!

Features:
- Play on with just one touch.

- Most addictive game to play for free.

- Never seen designs and game play.

- Simple, fun and a must have game for all age groups.

How To Play?
Hold on PRINT to start the game. Avoid colliding with the lines. Grab as many coins as you can. Remove the finger to slow down the speed.

Good Luck!!
